About Us

SERVED EVERY DAY SINCE 1990

We've been making healthy food last for 10 years.

Buboo’s opened on Thanksgiving Day 1990. Chef Owner Ron Silver began baking pies and selling them to restaurants and his neighbors out of a small kitchen at the corner of Hudson and North Moore St. in Tribeca. Today, NYC’s beloved restaurant and pie shop celebrates 27 years of classic, made from scratch American cooking.
